m_szDocTitle: Téo Electric Taxi Service To Launch In Montreal, And Some Cars Will Be Teslas
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Téo Electric Taxi Service To Launch In Montreal, And Some Cars Will Be Teslas The Huffington Post Canada  |  By Daniel Tencer reddit ADVERTISEMENT As if Uber wasn’t enough for the taxi industry to contend with, here’s another trend that could set the whole taxi world upside down: Electric cabs. Climate-conscious consumers in Montreal will soon have that option with the arrival of Téo, a taxi service that will operate an electric car fleet.
